summary: Revamp of ableinternetpayroll.com - creating a modern version of the payroll management platform website for evaluation purposes
architectural_notes: Prototype/demo version for evaluation - not a production payroll system
Focus on UI/UX modernization while maintaining existing content structure
Based on ableinternetpayroll.com features: employee management, payroll processing, tax filing, direct deposit, time tracking, benefits admin, reporting
2026 design trends: bold gradients, glassmorphism effects, smooth animations, scroll-triggered effects
Modern visual presentation while maintaining all existing content and features

existing_features.title: Create a modern landing page showcasing payroll management services with hero section, key features overview, and call-to-action elements

Display core payroll features including employee management, payroll processing, tax filing and compliance, direct deposit, time tracking integration, benefits administration, and reporting capabilities
Include sections highlighting mobile access capabilities and platform accessibility
Create informational sections covering compliance, security, and tax filing features (W-2s, 1099s, quarterly reports)

Design with a professional, trustworthy visual theme appropriate for a financial/payroll service platform, using a sophisticated color palette with clean typography and structured layouts that convey reliability and efficiency

Update the color palette throughout the application to use bold, vibrant gradients with modern 2026 aesthetics, replacing the current deep blue and teal scheme with trendy gradient combinations that feel fresh and forward-thinking while maintaining professional credibility for a financial service

Apply glassmorphism effects to card components, feature sections, and UI elements throughout the site, including frosted glass backgrounds with blur effects, subtle transparency, and light border treatments
Add smooth scroll-triggered animations to all major sections (Hero, FeaturesOverview, MobileAccessSection, ComplianceSection) that animate elements into view as users scroll down the page

Update typography styling with modern 2026 trends including larger, bolder headings, generous letter spacing, and contemporary font weight combinations that enhance readability while feeling cutting-edge
Add interactive hover effects and micro-animations to buttons, cards, and interactive elements including smooth transitions, scale effects, and visual feedback that enhance user engagement

Redesign the Hero section with a more dramatic, immersive visual treatment using large gradients, dynamic background elements, and modern layout that captures attention while maintaining the existing messaging and CTA structure
Update all existing content sections to maintain their information and messaging while applying the new 2026 visual design system, ensuring consistent modern aesthetics across the entire application

new_feature_requests.summary: Create revamped version of ableinternetpayroll.com website with same content
Redesign with trendy 2026 aesthetic: bold gradients, glassmorphism, animations, modern color palette
